remarks: Change the index set to a subset in a finite sum.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodss.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
fprodss.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprodss.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = 1 ) $.
fprodss.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
fprodss $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A C = prod_ k e. B C ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d k ph $.
